name: Winter Games: Santa jumping game
description:
If your are looking for winter games to play at this time of the year, i am proud to present you Santa jumping game. It does what it says, you play as Santa jumping, dodging, getting under obstacles and collecting as many gold stars as you can.

Beautiful graphics and a very cute character,  a stunning atmosphere  and very addictive gameplay,  along the procedurally generated level that it will never end. This is what the  game has to offer, hours and hours of pure fun every day, for many years to come! 😉
